TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit UserTrackingLocation extends System.Object

Attribute.AttributeName: [System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")]
[<System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")>]

summary.span: 定义与根工作流实例的可能执行路径中的某个用户事件相对应的活动限定位置。

span.span: Defines an activity-qualified location that corresponds to a user event in the potential execution path of a root workflow instance.

summary.span: 此类不能被继承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)] 活动设计器或工作流设计器可以使用任何重载 和 方法来检测工作流，以便采用用户事件的形式将数据发出到运行时跟踪基础结构。An activity designer or a workflow designer may use any of the overloaded and methods to instrument the workflow to emit data to the runtime tracking infrastructure as a user event. 发出的数据称为用户数据。The data emitted is referred to as user data. 与只会在活动或工作流状态更改时发生的活动状态事件和工作流状态事件不同，用户事件可以在工作流中检测到的任何位置发生。Unlike activity status events, and workflow status events, which occur only on activity or workflow status changes, user events can occur at any location that is instrumented in a workflow. 通过指定以下各项为这种位置定义匹配参数：用户数据的类型、必须从中发出用户数据的活动的类型、可以对此活动的一个或多个实例加以更精确限定的条件的集合、用户数据必须与之关联的可选键名、用户数据的派生类型是否应匹配，以及从活动（派生自指定活动的类型）中发出的用户数据是否应匹配。A defines the matching parameters for such a location by specifying the type of the user data, the type of the activity from which it must be emitted, a collection of conditions that can more precisely qualify an instance or instances of this activity, an optional key name with which the user data must be associated, whether derived types of the user data should be matched, and whether user data emitted from activities derived from the type of the specified activity should be matched. > [!NOTE] > 单一 可以引用工作流实例的可能执行路径中的多个实际位置。A single may refer to more than one actual location in the potential execution path of a workflow instance. 您可以将 添加到 或 ，以便为 中的 定义匹配参数。You may add a to either or in order to define the match parameters for a in a . 对于要由运行时跟踪基础结构匹配的 ，必须按如下顺序满足以下三个一般条件：发出用户事件的活动必须与 、、 和 指定的活动集合相匹配；与用户数据关联的键（如果存在）必须与 相匹配；并且，用户事件发出的用户数据的类型必须与 、 和 指定的用户数据类型的集合相匹配。There are three general conditions which must be met in the following order for the to be matched by the runtime tracking infrastructure: the activity that has emitted a user event must match the set of activities specified by , , , and ; the key, if one exists, associated with the user data must match ; and, the type of the user data emitted by the user event must match the set of user data types specified by , , and . 只有在所有这三个条件都得到满足时，运行时跟踪基础结构才会认为 匹配。Only if all three of these conditions are met, does the runtime tracking infrastructure consider the matched. 若要配置 ，必须设置 或 以指定要匹配的用户数据类型，并设置 或 以指定必须从中发出要匹配的用户数据的活动类型。To configure a , you must set either or to specify the type of the user data to be matched and either or to specify the type of the activity from which the user data must be emitted to be matched. 您可以将 对象添加到 ，以便更完全地限定必须从中发出用户数据的活动。You may add objects to to more completely qualify the activity from which the user data must be emitted. 您可以设置 ，以指定应当匹配派生自用户数据类型（由 或 指定）的用户数据，并且可以设置 ，以指定应当匹配从派生自活动类型（由 或 指定）的活动中发出的用户数据。You may set to specify that user data derived from the user data type specified by or should be matched, and you may set to specify that user data emitted from activities derived from the activity type specified by or should be matched. 您可以设置 以指定只应为此 匹配与指定键名关联的用户数据。You may set to specify that only user data associated with the specified key name should be matched for this . 如果 为空引用（在 Visual Basic 中为 `Nothing`），运行时跟踪结构将不会尝试匹配与用户数据关联的键。If is a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic), the runtime tracking structure will not try to match the key associated with the user data.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 无参数构造函数会初始化一个空的 。The parameterless constructor initializes an empty . 必须指定要匹配的用户数据类型，以及必须从中发出要匹配的用户数据的活动类型。You must specify both the type of the user data to match and the type of the activity from which it must be emitted in order to be matched. 因此，若要配置 ，必须显式设置 或 ，以指定必须从中发出要匹配的用户数据的活动类型，同时，必须显式设置 或 ，以指定要匹配的用户数据类型。Therefore, to configure the you must explicitly set either or to specify the type of an activity from which user data must be emitted to be matched, and you must also explicitly set either or to specify the type of the user data to be matched. 您可以通过设置 的其他属性来进一步配置它。You may further configure the by setting its other properties.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数初始化与指定类型的用户数据（从工作流中发出）匹配的 。This constructor initializes a that matches user data of the specified type emitted from the workflow. 必须为 指定要匹配的用户数据的 `argumentTypeName` 的非限定名称。You must specify the unqualified name of the of the user data to be matched for `argumentTypeName`. 必须在代码中显式设置 或 以便正确配置 。You must explicitly set either or in your code to properly configure the . 您可以通过设置 的其他属性来进一步限定它。You may further qualify the by setting its other properties.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数初始化与指定类型的所有用户数据（从指定类型的活动中发出）匹配的 。This constructor initializes a that matches all user data of the specified type emitted from activities of the specified type. 必须指定活动和用户数据的 的非限定名称。You must specify the unqualified name of the of the activity and of the user data. 例如， 活动的 的非限定名称为“Code”。For example the unqualified name of the of a activity is "Code". 您可以通过设置 的其他属性来进一步限定它。You may further qualify the by setting its other properties.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 必须指定活动的类型的非限定名称。You must specify the unqualified name of the type of the activity. 例如，若要指定 活动的非限定名称，请将 设置为“Code”。For example, to specify the unqualified name of a activity, set to "Code". 当您用 XML 直接编写配置文件时，通过 可以更为轻松地指定发出用户数据的活动的类型。 provides a much easier way to specify the type of the activity that emits the user data when you author a profile directly in XML. 还提供了一种与版本无关的方式来引用活动的类型。 also provides a version-independent way of referring to the type of the activity. 您必须指定 或 以正确配置 。You must specify either or to properly configure the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当您用 XML 直接编写配置文件时，通过 可以更为轻松地指定用户数据的类型。 provides a much easier way to specify the type of the user data when you author a profile directly in XML. 还提供了一种与版本无关的方式来引用用户数据的类型。 also provides a version-independent way of referring to the type of the user data. 您必须指定 或 以正确配置 。You must specify either or to properly configure the .

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Conditions As TrackingConditionCollection

summary.span: 获取一个条件集合，这些条件用于限定必须从中发出要跟踪的用户数据的活动。

span.span: Gets a collection of conditions that are used to qualify the activity from which the user data must be emitted to be tracked.

value.span: 一个 ，用于限定必须从中发出用户数据的活动。

span.span: A that is used to qualify the activity from which the user data must be emitted.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用 更精确地定义活动类型（由 或 指定）的实例，用户事件必须从中发出以匹配跟踪位置。You can use to more precisely define the instance of the activity type specified by or from which the user event must be emitted to match the tracking location. 例如，如果要仅匹配 等于“MyCode”的 活动，你可以将 设置为“Code”，并将 添加到 ，后者指定活动实例的 ID 属性必须等于“MyCode”。For example, if you want to match only activities with an equal to "MyCode", you can set to "Code" and add an to that specifies that the ID property of the activity instance must be equal to "MyCode". 中的每个 均必须为 true，活动才能匹配。Every in must be true for the activity to be matched.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ KeyName { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.KeyName : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置名称，用户数据必须与该名称关联才能使 得以匹配。

span.span: Gets or sets the name with which the user data must be associated for the to be matched.

value.span: 一个 键，用户数据必须与该键关联才能使 得以匹配，或者为空引用（在 Visual Basic 中为 ）。

span.span: A key with which the user data must be associated for the to be matched or a null reference ( in Visual Basic).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 活动设计器或工作流设计器可以使用 或 将字符串键与用户事件中发出的用户数据关联。An activity designer or a workflow designer can use either or to associate a string key with the user data that is emitted in a user event. 如果 不是空引用（`Nothing`），则与用户数据关联的键必须与 的值匹配，才能使 得以匹配。If is not a null reference (`Nothing`), the key associated with the user data must match the value of for the to be matched. 如果 是空引用 (`Nothing`)，则运行时跟踪基础结构不会检查匹配键来确定 是否已匹配。If is a null reference (`Nothing`), the runtime tracking infrastructure does not check for a matching key to determine whether the is matched.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool MatchDerivedActivityTypes { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指定在从派生自活动类型（由 或 指定）的活动中发出用户数据时，是否应对用户数据进行跟踪。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the user data should be tracked when it is emitted from activities derived from the activity type specified by or .

value.span: 如果在从派生自类型（由 或 指定）的活动中发出用户数据时应对用户数据进行跟踪，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the user data should be tracked when it is emitted from activities derived from the type specified by or ; otherwise, .
The default is .

span.span: The user can filter by the type of the user tracked data by specifying the or .

value.span: 如果应对派生自用户数据类型（由 或 指定）的用户数据进行跟踪，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if user data derived from the type of the user data specified by or should be tracked; otherwise, .
The default is .
